title: Rooftop Terrace, USB Outlets & Fiber Internet, Large Windows
posting_body: ['Contact us for details on our specials!', 'Welcome to The Dwight', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 140', 'OR Text', '140', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 521 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Berkeley’s modern apartments designed to make you happy.', 'Mellow out on a rooftop terrace with gas grills, fire pits, dining area and heaters; or mingle in the resident lounge and activity room.', 'Pamper your furry friend at the pet run and washing station.', 'Inside your home, large windows, 9-foot ceilings, quartz countertops, tile backsplashes and hard-surface flooring lend sophistication to your space.', 'Proximity to UC, public transit and Berkeley’s unique shops and restaurants connects you to the larger community.', 'The Dwight.', 'Apartment living, evolved.', 'Features:', "USB Outlets & Fiber Internet, Energy Star Appliances, 9' Ceilings, Great Kitchens, LG Washers & Dryers, Large Windows, Hard Surface Flooring, 8' Solid Core Doors, Air Conditioning", 'Community Amenities:', 'Outdoor Heaters, Bike Room & Workshop, Rooftop Terrace, Dog Area & Washing Station', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'lgQjKNf04y38']
